definition: to rake with machine gunfire/to strafe/to machine-gun down

sentences.english: The casuingties said Lord Saville were the victims of unjustified firing by the soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 伤亡者是由士兵无情扫射的受害者。

sentences.english: One Colossi will be able to kill a group of Marines with one sweep of its lasers.
sentences.chinese: 一个巨像的一次激光扫射可以干掉一队的机枪兵。

sentences.english: The front row of soldiers were mown down by machinegun fire.
sentences.chinese: 最前面的一排士兵被机枪火力扫射倒了。

sentences.english: The hospital chief executive said the attackers just barged in and fired indiscriminately.
sentences.chinese: 这家医院院长表示，袭击者冲进来，乱枪扫射。

sentences.english: I asked, "Don't those planes strafing the road bother you?
sentences.chinese: 我问“这些扫射的飞机没打扰你么？”

sentences.english: The Spartans sprayed the Elites and the Hunters, who turtled behind their shields.
sentences.chinese: 斯巴达们向躲在护盾后的精英和猎人猛烈扫射。

sentences.english: She shielded the wounded soldier from the strafing of the enemy plane with her own body.
sentences.chinese: 在敌机扫射时，她用自己的身子护住伤员。

sentences.english: Roy: They might be out to strafe this bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能出来扫射这桥。

sentences.english: The gunmen blasted the car with a hail of bullets.
sentences.chinese: 枪手们以一阵弹雨向汽车扫射。

sentences.english: Her work oozes with creativity and bursts with color.
sentences.chinese: 有创意和她的作品色彩扫射渗出。

sentences.english: Raised a gun than the benefit, Piumino Moncler Uomo, and Rui shell the card start strafing together.
sentences.chinese: 比利举起了枪，和瑞贝卡一起开始了扫射。

sentences.english: Heidi pretends to shoot around, Tsai and Cheng fall down in cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 海蒂俏皮地做扫射状，蔡和郑配合地倒下。

sentences.english: As he throws the card to Jack, Walsh is killed by a barrage of bullets.
sentences.chinese: 在沃尔什把卡扔给杰克时，他被一轮子弹扫射打死了。

sentences.english: Dr. Roquefort’s eyes strafed the group and zeroed tight on the few he thought absolutely loyal.
sentences.chinese: 雷孟达的眼睛扫射这人群紧盯着那些对他绝对忠诚的。

sentences.english: Oh, did we forget to mention that Roger Rabbit gets machine gunned to death?
sentences.chinese: 对了，我们是否忘了提兔子罗杰被机关枪扫射死了。

sentences.english: The fire of our artillery troops raked their gunboat.
sentences.chinese: 我方炮兵部队的炮火向他们的炮艇扫射。

definition: also written 機槍|机枪/machine gun
to open fire/to shoot a gun
